channel.title: Dedicated/VPS hosting help?!?
channel.description:
Hey guys and gals, Just wanted to ask a for a few opinions on buying a dedi server or a VPS. I have almost completed my newest server and want to buy a dedi server or VPS from the start within the next 2 days, so because i have never bought this before im just wanting to ask... -Whats specs am i looking for for a clean running server? -What prices are reasonable? -Whats sites can you reccomend? -Any other info i should know before purchasing...
I have been searching around and found this site http://www.vpsland.com/ezwin.html (tell me if im not allowed to post link) and thought starting on the STARTER PACKAGE and working my way up when i grew would be a decent idea. If not, TELL ME! :P
Thanks SwiftY
